column4: in the future i plan to install from source.how is it possible to get recognized by synaptic or aptitude.is it any command?because to remove manually it is so long
i dont understand you. you want to install "from source"?
so you want to install a program, that is *not* in the repository of ubuntu, but you can access the sourcecode of it?

ok, that means you want to build an apt-package, which is not trivial. maybe try searching ppa for this program - possibly someone else did the work already (but this would involve trusting this random person)
